temporal_rules.description: Features must use data from at least 61 minutes before target
temporal_rules.rationale: Longest window is w60 (60 minutes) + 1 minute buffer to prevent look-ahead bias
validation_checks: No feature timestamp > target timestamp - 61 minutes
All rolling windows complete before target timestamp
No future data contamination in any feature
Train/val/test splits are strictly chronological (no shuffling)
